## Heading

This filter adds formatting to heading text.




```{.python .molviewspec-live}
structure = (builder
    .download(url="https://www.ebi.ac.uk/pdbe/entry-files/download/1cbs_updated.cif")
    .parse(format="mmcif")
    .model_structure()
    .component()
    .representation()
    .color(color="blue")
)
```
